argument.name: fieldname
argument.description: The name of an RTF memo field.

page.description: Returns the text in a RTF memo field.
page.discussion: RTF_FIELD_TO_TEXT() returns a text string with the data in a RTF memo field. This function is useful for extracting the data in a RTF memo field.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following examples work with a table field named rtfmemo.
section.example: CONTAINSI(RTF_FIELD_TO_TEXT("rtfmemo"),"alpha") -> searches a RTF memo field called "rtfmemo" for the word "alpha". ' assuming that the memo field contained "Alpha Software" ? "The memo contains: " + RTF_FIELD_TO_TEXT("rtfmemo") = "The memo contains: Alpha Software"
